snippet: President Obama and his wife, Michelle, arrived on Martha’s Vineyard before their children for a weeklong vacation, giving the president and the first lady time for golf, socializing and each other.
abstract: Edgartown Journal; Pres Obama and First Lady Michelle arrive on Martha’s Vineyard ahead of their children for weeklong vacation, giving them time for golf, socializing and each other.

byline.contributor: Nicholas Confessore contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: President Obama and his wife, Michelle, arrived on Martha’s Vineyard before their children for a weeklong vacation, giving the president and the first lady time for golf, socializing and each other.

headline.main: The First Couple’s Chance to Put Themselves First
headline.print_headline: The First Couple’s Chance To Put Themselves First
